title: Why does point and click cc exist after 8 years of the games release?
body:
Meaning that there is no possible way to dodge it because it's a guaranteed hit, unless you become untargetable or buy QSS. Is it to counter champions like Katarina from getting a pentakill or something? Regardless, this shit just drives me up the damn wall, especially Fiddle's 2.5 undodgable fear. There shouldn't be a ability in the game where it has a 7 second cooldown, prevents movement of any sorts, and is undodgable in the game, QSS has a 90 second cooldown, meaning that they can use their 7 second cooldown ability 12 times before QSS is even back up again.
